name: Meri Pyaari Bindu
review:
A confused script that battles with sense to improve. It's only the actors that pick this movie with their amazing charm and screen presence. The direction and writing are the let downs here.

Director: Akshay Roy
Actors: Parineeti Chopra, Ayushmann Khurrana
Writer: Suprotim Sengupta

Rating: 2 / 5

Storyline Rating: 2

Acting Rating: 3
Parineeti Chopra: 3
Ayushmann Khurrana: 3

Direction Rating: 2

Music Rating: 3

Cinematography: 3

Editing: 3
